subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: West Virginia forward Joe Alexander will remain in the coming N.B.A. draft. Alexander entered his name April 9, but initially said he would not sign with an agent. The university announced that Alexander would not return for his senior season. Alexander led the Mountaineers with 16.9 points and 6.4 rebounds a game. He was named to the all-Big East first team.
